one_shot_example.instruction:
Instruction:
### Task: Which organizations are heavily dependent on state support according to the US Counter-Terrorism Coordinator's Office?

### Context: Document Id: 1
Title:FACT SHEET: National Strategy for Countering Domestic Terrorism
Url:https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2021/06/15/fact-sheet-national-strategy-for-countering-domestic-terrorism/
Snippet:The U.S. Government will increase support to Federal, state, and local law enforcement in addressing domestic terrorism nationwide. U.S. Attorney’s Offices and FBI field offices across the ...

Document Id: 2
Title:Bureau of Counterterrorism - United States Department of State
Url:https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-political-affairs/bureau-of-counterterrorism/
Snippet:Our Mission. The Bureau of Counterterrorism's mission is to promote U.S. national security by taking a leading role in developing coordinated strategies and approaches to defeat terrorism abroad and securing the counterterrorism cooperation of international partners.

Document Id: 3
Title:2022 Bureau of Counterterrorism Annual Report
Url:https://www.state.gov/2022-bureau-of-counterterrorism-annual-report/
Snippet:The United States and the international community remained committed in the fight against terrorism, and we have made important gains in countering terrorism around the world. This annual report captures some of CT’s most important achievements in 2022 to keep the United States and U.S. citizens safe and secure from terrorist threats abroad.

Document Id: 4
Title:State-sponsored terrorism - Wikipedia
Url:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/State-sponsored_terrorism
Snippet:Organizations like Hamas, Hezbollah and Palestinian Islamic Jihad are heavily dependent on state support. According to the US Counter-Terrorism Coordinator's Office this support can include "funds, weapons, materials and the secure areas" that organizations use for "planning and conducting operations".

Document Id: 5
Title:State Sponsors of Terrorism (U.S. list) - Wikipedia
Url:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/State_Sponsors_of_Terrorism_(U.S._list)
Snippet:"State Sponsors of Terrorism" is a designation applied to countries that are alleged to have "repeatedly provided support for acts of international terrorism" per the ... According to the U.S. Department of State, Cuba "encouraged terrorism in the hope of provoking indiscriminate violence and repression, in order to weaken government legitimacy ...

Document Id: 6
Title:Bureau of Counterterrorism and Countering Violent Extremism
Url:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bureau_of_Counterterrorism_and_Countering_Violent_Extremism
Snippet:The coordinator and special envoy for the Global Coalition to Counter the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant between 2020 and 2021 was Nathan Sales. Originally the Office for Combating Terrorism and later the Bureau of Counterterrorism, the bureau's name was expanded in 2016 to include countering violent extremism in its mandate.

Document Id: 7
Title:Country Reports on Terrorism 2020 - United States Department of State
Url:https://www.state.gov/reports/country-reports-on-terrorism-2020/
Snippet:The UN Security Council’s Counter-Terrorism Committee (CTC) and Counter-Terrorism Executive Directorate (CTED). The United States supported CTC and CTED efforts to assess evolving terrorist trends and to analyze capacity gaps of member states to implement UNSCRs 1373, 1624, 2178, 2396, and other relevant counterterrorism resolutions, and to ...

Document Id: 8
Title:Programs and Initiatives - United States Department of State
Url:https://www.state.gov/bureau-of-counterterrorism-programs-and-initiatives/
Snippet:The Technical Support Working Group (TSWG) is an interagency forum that coordinates U.S. government-wide technology prototyping under the National Combating Terrorism Research and Development (R&D) Program. The mission of the TSWG is to identify, prioritize, and coordinate interagency and international R&D requirements and to rapidly develop ...

Document Id: 9
Title:United States and state-sponsored terrorism - Wikipedia
Url:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_and_state-sponsored_terrorism
Snippet:The United States has at various times in recent history provided support to terrorist and paramilitary organizations around the world. It has also provided assistance to numerous authoritarian regimes that have used state terrorism as a tool of repression.. American support for terrorists has been prominent in Latin America and the Middle East. From 1981 to 1991, the United States provided ...

Document Id: 10
Title:About Us – Bureau of Counterterrorism - United States Department of State
Url:https://www.state.gov/about-us-bureau-of-counterterrorism/
Snippet:The Bureau of Counterterrorism leads the Department of State in the whole-of-government effort to counter terrorism abroad and to secure the United States against foreign terrorist threats. The predecessor organization to the Bureau of Counterterrorism was the Office for Combating Terrorism, created in 1972 upon the recommendation of a special committee appointed by President Richard […]

Document Id: 11
Title:Background Press Call by Senior Administration Officials on the ...
Url:https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/press-briefings/2021/06/15/background-press-call-by-senior-administration-officials-on-the-national-strategy-for-countering-domestic-terrorism/
Snippet:Our goal is to enhance domestic terrorism analysis and improve information sharing throughout law enforcement at the federal, state, local, Tribal, and territorial level, and where appropriate ...

Answer:
one_shot_example.answer:
Answer:
According to the US Counter-Terrorism Coordinator's Office, organizations like Hamas, Hezbollah, and Palestinian Islamic Jihad are heavily dependent on state support. This support can include "funds, weapons, materials and the secure areas" that organizations use for "planning and conducting operations." (Document Id: 4, Title: State-sponsored terrorism - Wikipedia)

agents.name: Factual Question Answering Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require analyzing retrieved documents to answer factual questions.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a factual RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should present a specific factual question that can be answered by analyzing the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction presenting a factual question and the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on how to use the documents to answer the question]

Answer:
[A comprehensive answer that accurately synthesizes information from the retrieved documents to answer the factual question, with appropriate citations or references to specific documents]

agents.name: Multiple Choice Question Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require analyzing retrieved documents to answer multiple-choice questions.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a multiple-choice RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should present a question with 3-5 possible answers, where determining the correct answer requires analyzing and synthesizing information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction presenting a multiple-choice question and the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on how to use the documents to select the correct answer]

Answer:
[The correct answer choice with a detailed explanation that cites specific information from the retrieved documents to justify the selection]

agents.name: Comparative Analysis Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require comparing and contrasting information from different retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a comparative analysis RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to compare and contrast different perspectives, approaches, or findings presented in the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for a comparative analysis of information in the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what aspects to compare]

Answer:
[A comprehensive answer that effectively compares and contrasts the requested aspects across the retrieved documents, noting similarities, differences, and potential implications]

agents.name: Summarization Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require summarizing key information from retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a summarization RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to summarize the key information, findings, or arguments presented across the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for a summary of key information from the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what to focus on]

Answer:
[A concise yet comprehensive summary that effectively captures the most important information from the retrieved documents, organized in a logical and coherent manner]

agents.name: Evidence Evaluation Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require evaluating the quality, reliability, or consistency of evidence across retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for an evidence evaluation RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to evaluate the quality, reliability, or consistency of the evidence presented across the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for an evaluation of the evidence in the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what criteria to use]

Answer:
[A thorough evaluation that assesses the quality, reliability, or consistency of the evidence across the retrieved documents, identifying strengths, weaknesses, and potential biases]

agents.name: Mathematical Problem Solving Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require using information from retrieved documents to solve mathematical or quantitative problems.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a mathematical problem-solving RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should present a mathematical or quantitative problem that can be solved using information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction presenting a mathematical problem and the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on how to use the documents to solve the problem]

Answer:
[A step-by-step solution that correctly applies information from the retrieved documents to solve the mathematical problem, showing all work and explaining the reasoning]

agents.name: Technical Explanation Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require providing technical explanations based on retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a technical explanation RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to explain a technical concept, process, or system using information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for a technical explanation based on the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what to explain]

Answer:
[A clear, accurate, and detailed technical explanation that effectively synthesizes information from the retrieved documents, making complex concepts accessible while maintaining technical accuracy]

agents.name: Decision Support Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require making recommendations or decisions based on retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a decision support RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to make a recommendation or decision based on information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for a recommendation or decision based on the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what factors to consider]

Answer:
[A well-reasoned recommendation or decision that clearly draws on information from the retrieved documents, explaining how different factors were weighed and why the conclusion is justified]

agents.name: Timeline Construction Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require constructing chronological timelines based on retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a timeline construction RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to construct a chronological timeline of events, developments, or changes using information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking to construct a timeline based on the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what events or developments to include]

Answer:
[A comprehensive chronological timeline that accurately organizes information from the retrieved documents, highlighting key dates, events, and developments in a clear and structured format]

agents.name: Missing Information Identification Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require identifying gaps or missing information in retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a missing information identification RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to identify what important information is missing or incomplete in the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking to identify missing or incomplete information in the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what aspects to evaluate]

Answer:
[A thorough analysis that identifies specific gaps or missing information in the retrieved documents, explaining why this information would be important and how it might impact the understanding of the topic]

agents.name: Procedural Guidance Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require providing step-by-step guidance based on retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a procedural guidance RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should ask to provide step-by-step instructions or guidance using information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction asking for step-by-step guidance based on the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on what procedure to explain]

Answer:
[Clear, comprehensive step-by-step instructions that accurately synthesize procedural information from the retrieved documents, presented in a logical sequence with any necessary cautions or considerations]

agents.name: Fact Verification Agent
agents.system_prompt: You are an expert in creating retrieval-augmented generation tasks that require verifying factual claims against retrieved documents.
agents.user_prompt_template:
Create an instruction-answer pair for a fact verification RAG task based on the following document collection. The instruction should present one or more factual claims and ask to verify their accuracy using information from the retrieved documents.

Document collection:
{text}

Provide the instruction and answer in the following format:

Instruction:
[Your detailed instruction presenting factual claims to verify against the retrieved documents, with clear guidance on how to assess their accuracy]

Answer:
[A thorough verification that examines each claim against the information in the retrieved documents, clearly stating whether each claim is supported, contradicted, or unaddressed by the available evidence]
